data.title: Fritz Haber: The Man Who Invented Chemical Warfare - Behind the Bastards
meta_keywords: Fritz Haber: The Man Who Invented Chemical Warfare
data.meta_description:
In episode 81, Robert is joined by Karah Preiss and Oz Woloshyn (Sleepwalkers Podcast) to discuss Fritz Haber.

Footnotes:

1. Master Mind: The Rise and Fall of Fritz Haber, the Nobel Laureate Who Launched the Age of Chemical Warfare

2. A BRIEF BIOGRAPHY OF FRITZ HABER

3. The German Dr. Evil who invented chemical warfare

4. Fritz Haber’s Experiments in Life and Death

5. 100 years on: The day the first poison gas attack changed the face of warfare forever

6. The Tragedy of Fritz Haber: The Monster Who Fed The World

7. Seven Billion Humans: The World Fritz Haber Made

8.  Clara Immerwahr

9. Haber: Ethics in the Laboratory

data.text: "Amy and T.J." is hosted by renowned television news anchors Amy Robach and T. J. Holmes. Hosts and executive producers Robach and Holmes are a formidable broadcasting team with decades of experience delivering headline news and captivating viewers nationwide. Now, the duo will get behind the microphone to explore meaningful conversations about current events, pop culture and everything in between. Nothing is off limits. “Amy & T.J.” is guaranteed to be informative, entertaining and above all, authentic. It marks the first time Robach and Holmes speak publicly since their own names became a part of the headlines. Follow @ajrobach, and @officialtjholmes on Instagram for updates.
